title: How to Kill the Tyrant in Resident Evil Gamecube Remake

steps.headline: Grab your magnum,and fire nine shots at him in the first encounter  When he is down,if your Chris get the lab.key then activate the computer
If your Jill,just activate the computer too  next go through the door
I your second encounter have the second most powerful gun in the game,the self defense gun.
steps.description: This gun only has one piece of ammo in it,and there's no piece of ammo for it so save  it when you need it

steps.headline: grab your grenade launcher and fire around 8 incendiary rounds
have at least 4 acid shells for your grenade launcher
Fire 1 acid shell he should be almost dead#  if you don't see the rocket launcher pull out your shotgun (or grenade launcher)
Fire until you get the Rock.Launcher
fire,if he blocked it,fire until he is dead  You should have had finish the game in 2 Min.
steps.description: or less  remember to have at least 3 full healing items before you start the 1 and 2 battle with him

text: Grab your magnum,and fire nine shots at him in the first encounter  When he is down,if your Chris get the lab.key then activate the computer  If your Jill,just activate the computer too  next go through the door  I your second encounter have the second most powerful gun in the game,the self defense gun. This gun only has one piece of ammo in it,and there's no piece of ammo for it so save  it when you need it Fire at him  grab your grenade launcher and fire around 8 incendiary rounds  have at least 4 acid shells for your grenade launcher  Fire 1 acid shell he should be almost dead#  if you don't see the rocket launcher pull out your shotgun (or grenade launcher)  Fire until you get the Rock.Launcher  fire,if he blocked it,fire until he is dead  You should have had finish the game in 2 Min. or less  remember to have at least 3 full healing items before you start the 1 and 2 battle with him
